name: Evolve (itch) (stumpybean)
description:
My first attempt at a Ludum Dare. I have to say I definitely tried to go too big.  I didn't do half of what I set out to do but I guess you live and learn :). The games instructions are in game and it is left a little open so you have to try and figure out things yourself. 

This was my first time making music so haha I apologise if it's horrible.
